Name: COLINA: Legacy
About the game: COLINA: Legacy is a psychological horror game that weaves a dark story with many unexpected twists and turns. Play as Alex who sets out to visit his grandmother only to wake in terror finding himself alone in her house. Or so he thinks. Where are his parents? What does the writing on the walls mean? Alex must uncover hidden secrets as he explores. A Mysterious Escape Room The design of COLINA: Legacy was inspired by escape rooms with enthusiasts in mind. Cryptic puzzles await Alex as he searches through his grandmother's house and the surrounding areas. Acquiring various runes to power his flashlight, Alex has the ultimate puzzle solving tool that reveals painted messages, unlocks mechanisms, and battles foes with its beam. Return to Old-School Survival Horror The third-person camera perspective pays homage to some of the great classic horror games. Alex quickly learns he is not the only being roaming the halls, but he is well equipped to handle the situation. The only weapon is the flashlight so keep batteries charged and ready. Something Lurks Deeper Nothing is quite what it appears. Each hidden message and fragment of ancient manuscript begin to paint a terrible tale beyond Alex’s comprehension. What dark secrets lie beneath the foundation? Solving the many mysteries of the house is the only way to reveal the truth. Features: Uncover the mystery behind Alex’s lost parents and granny that is steeped in deceit and dark deception. Hunt or pacify monsters with your flashlight before they devour you. Outlast your foes and avoid being their prey. Work your way through the rooms of the house and solve the many escape room type puzzles. There is something more to the evil within the house. What’s behind Alex’s amnesia of past childhood events? Inspired by classic horror titles such as P.T. Demo, Resident Evil and Silent Hill.
